awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Three children living in a displacement camp in northern Uganda compete in their country's national music and dance festival.
plot: Three children living in a displacement camp in northern Uganda compete in their country's national music and dance festival.
title: War Dance

tomatoes.consensus: War/Dance is beautifully filmed, and effectively captures the heartbreaking and uplifting experiences of its subjects.
